name: Applied Responsive Web Design Projects with Tests

challenges.title: Build a Pre Designed Page (blog)
description: The page must match pixel for pixel as close as possible.
Technology Stack: 1. Use only HTML and CSS to complete this project, do NOT use any libraries.
This page must be responsive and have 2 distinct layouts at sizes 1200px and 960px wide.

1200px wide
click to view full size image.

960px wide
click to view full size image.
For all the assets need to build this site click here.
The categories side bar must be a unordered list of <a> tags and highlight when hovering.
The highlighted text must be <a&gr; tags and underline when hovering.
Remember to use the Research-Ask method if you get stuck.
